contextId.information: James is referring to one's heart, emotions, and actions. AT: "control his behavior" or "control his actions" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])

Here "death" refers to spiritual death, eternal separation from God. AT: "will save him from spiritual death, and God will forgive the sinner for all of his sins" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: will save him from death, and will cover over a great number of sins
